pages.title: Ritual Note
pages.text: Craft yourself a wand ritual note using the provided recipe. This will explain how to properly setup and preform a $(d)Wand Ritual$(). This is required for crafting any wand.

pages.title: Preforming Rituals
pages.text: Once the ritual is setup according to the note, you can right click a $(d)Great Wand Hilt$() on the center candle to preform the ritual. This will yield a Wand of the corresponding type. Reference the Wand entry for crafting details.
